item.name: Love Letter
item.description: Happy Valentines Day! This item was given out on Feb 2023. Open the letter to receive some special stuff!

item.name: Anniversary Present
item.description: It's OwO's anniversary! This item was given out on March 2023. Open the present to receive some special stuff!

item.name: Fake Lootbox
item.description:
Opens a lootbox! Check how many you have in 'owo inv'!
April Fools! This item was given out in April 2023.

item.name: 3M Present
item.description: OwO Bot hit 3 million users, it's time to celebrate! This item was given out on May 2023. Open the present to receive some special stuff!

item.name: Pride Hive
item.foundText: ?emoji? **|** You hear a bustling bee hive overhead brimming with activity!
item.description: You hear a bustling bee hive overhead brimming with activity! This item was given out on June 2023 for Pride Month! Open them to greet a bee!

item.name: Summer Basket
item.foundText: ?emoji? **|** Come on, we are going for a picnic! Can you carry the basket?
item.description: Summer is here! Take this basket full of goodies on your picnic! This item was given out on July 2023 for Summer!
